Reviews.Title: “Affordable, clean hotel with excellent central location”

Reviews.Content: palym located near gare de lyon station catch train charles de gaul airport metro blocks walk notre dame river modest kept comfortable price wont leave wishing youd gone else option individuals families couples spend days exploring paris dont intend spending lot time hotel simply using base operations nearby street breakfast
